about_the_game:
Ajna's adventure and the world of Loka come alive in the audiosensory spectacle that is the official Indivisible soundtrack, composed by genre veteran Hiroki Kikuta. (Secret of Mana, Koudelka)

MP3 (WAV coming soon)

2) Outbreak Zone
3) Ajna

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Yosemite 10.10.4
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3 Core
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Indivisible - Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: One eardrum
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i5-3470
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 670
  • Additional Notes: Two eardrums

short_description: Ajna's adventure and the world of Loka come alive in the audiosensory spectacle that is the official Indivisible soundtrack, composed by genre veteran Hiroki Kikuta. (Secret of Mana, Koudelka)
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Russian, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
